Coverify



Common Problems



Why isn't my magazine loading?


If album or artist covers are not displaying in the image, please click the Coverify logo to refresh the page. If you just refresh the browser, you will have the same session and it still may not work as expected.

If nothing is loading, there may be a high volume of requests. Spotify can drop the API requests any at a given time and there is no way to prevent that. Please click the Coverify logo to refresh the page or revisit again later.

Why is my magazine missing some elements?


If your magazine is not looking as expected (any values are saying 'Undefined' or look null), please click the Coverify logo to refresh the page.

Why does the title of some albums/artists look strange?


If you have data from an artist name or song title that is very long or has unexpected charaters, the magazine may not look as designed. Try another term to see different versions of your magazine with different streaming data.

Coverify is best viewed on a computer browser or a device with a minimum width of 350px. Anything smaller than that may not look as designed.

Can you link any other music streaming services besides Spotify?


Not currently.
